name: YouChooseExtremeSurvival
0:
”Alexa, open Extreme Survival”
”Alexa, play Extreme Survival”
”Alexa, open Extreme Survival and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: extreme survival
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: EXTREME SURVIVAL is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features five action-packed, interactive stories, Can You Survive the Wilderness?, Can You Survive Antarctica?, Can You Survive Extreme Mountain Climbing?, Can You Survive the Desert?, and Can You Survive the Jungle? With simple voice commands, you’ll learn about survival skills in various settings and make choices that will lead to either survival or doom.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
